name: Pigeon Bird Survival Simulator 3D 2
description:
Enjoy the second part of the famous city bird survival simulator! Live the life of real pigeon - search for food, fight against city predators – like cats and dogs – with Pigeon Bird Survival Simulator 3D – 2!
Explore the sky above the city streets and blocks, avoid being a prey and survive at all costs! Fight against other pigeons or recruit them to your flock! Enjoy being a city bird – search for food, fight against city predators, meet other wild pigeons to join your dovecote, build nests, raise up doweling and fly over the city streets!
Get ready for the ultimate bird city simulator and fly like a pigeon! Do a crap on the citizens to earn points, buy power-ups and level up your city bird’s abilities! Maintain health, hunger and energy rate to set up a flock of pigeons! Set up your own flock, fight for your life against cats, snakes, and other predators, compete against other city animals and have fun!
Spread your wings and fly like a bird in the sky above the skyscrapers and city streets with Pigeon Bird Survival Simulator 3D - 2!
Pigeon Bird Survival Simulator 3D – 2 features:
Sequel of world-famous realistic city bird survival simulator
Absolutely new city filled with land predators and other birds alike
Ability to do crap – don’t miss the human heads!
Meet dove, build nest and raise up nestlings
Ultimate customization of your pigeon
Follow the wind towards the big city and fly between the skyscrapers and large buildings, see the city from up high in the air and take flight just like a real bird of peace! Check Pigeon Bird Survival Simulator 3D – 2 and emerge into the atmosphere of city bird’s life!
